我想都不用想就知道反川的人又high了。@玩网低级壬 @nolik 你们恨不得downvote一万次吧？可惜只有一次。你们知道为什么这个帖子没有几个反对的声音吗？你们以为没有反对的声音就代表大家都赞同你们吗？还不是因为品葱这个傻逼的声望设定。我给你们讲，就算我这辈子都拿不到1声望，我也不会因为怕被踩而不说话。


我想诸位可能都不知道确实有注射紫外光这种疗法：

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC6122858/
https://twitter.com/KayaJones/status/1253680606048849923
https://www.hollywoodlanews.com/uv-light-kills-coronavirus/
https://www.nasdaq.com/press-release/aytu-bioscience-signs-exclusive-global-license-with-cedars-sinai-for-potential


@赵修业 就凭你能问出这种问题，我就知道证据摆在你面前，你也看不懂。

 The Healight technology employs proprietary methods of administering intermittent ultraviolet (UV) A light via a novel endotracheal medical device. 

我给你用大白话再解释一下：这种技术是通过向呼吸道照射（为了照顾你，我改成了照射，支人英文水平低，理解inject有困难）紫外光来实现杀死病毒的目的的。


你们有几个人看了英文原文？


https://abcnews.go.com/Politics/warnings-trump-suggesting-disinfectant-ingestion-deadly-wh-claims/story?id=70328631

"So supposing we hit the body with a tremendous -- whether it's ultraviolet or just a very powerful light -- and I think you said that hasn't been checked because of the testing," Trump said, looking at Bryan. "And then I said, supposing you brought the light inside the body, which you can do either through the skin or some other way, and I think you said you're going to test that too."

"I see the disinfectant that knocks it out in a minute, one minute. And is there a way we can do something like that by injection inside or almost a cleaning? As you see, it gets in the lungs, it does a tremendous number on the lungs, so it would be interesting to check that," the president continued.

这里的 disinfectant 是类比。就是说消毒剂可以杀菌，那么注射紫外光到身体内也可以。
